This project is about building an accessible ChatGPT app from your on computer.

The framework used in this project is [Streamlit](streamlit.io).

1.  Create a virtual environment for this project, appChatGPT, using virtualenv in PyCharm IDE.

2.  Create a **askGPT.py** file for executing ChatGPT on own computer and set environment API key for security, **OPENAI_API_KEY**. ([Ref](tutorial: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/5112595-best-practices-for-api-key-safety))
